name: Overleaf Dark Theme
description:
Dark Theme for the Overleaf editor.
Built-in option between dark pdf viewer of default.
additional_info:
2021-12-12   -   Version 1.1.0

    * Added a drop-down setting in order to choose the pdf viewer Style:
          - Default Theme PDF viewer
          - Dark PDF viewer

    * Added Dark Theme to the "Rich Text" Editor.


2021-07-19   -   Version 1.0.0

    * Dark Theme for Source Editor
